Your Invited to a Online Party

Launching Today:

Launching Today: Join us for a new concept
in marketing – Speed Networking!! You’ve heard of speed dating?? Take
that idea and incorporate it into your business marketing plan. Meet
many different like-minded business people in a short period of time.
Get the word out about your business and products by utilizing “elevator
... speeches” and “5 minute commercials”. Weekly session! Monthly
meetings! Training! And more!!! http://wahmagazineonline.com/SpeedNetworking.aspx

BEST THING YET:
You place a 75.00 I will send you a free 4 pack of tea lights FREE yes I said FREE.

If you want you can go to my site and place a order at http://www2.mygc.com/AmandaSilverio

I promise this will be the last time I will ask my friends t help me out. I really want t sell candles and I think this is a great job the candles are worth every penny. Last longer too. If you would like to sell candles contact me and I will talk to you about it....

Please join our chat at http://xat.com/web_gear/chat/go_large.php?id=95096985 The cost is FREE now there is that word again FREE tell me are you going to pass this up
If you come I will send you a sample of our summer line. Please I am begging for you to support me.

Love you all and thanks for reading this...
Amanda
